Field Description: Tag number, appearing on aluminum tag attached to each tree; also matches dendrometer to plot data, though treeID is more secure
Tag number, appearing on aluminum tag attached to each stem, matching plot database
Six-letter species mnemonic, matching that used in main plot database
Designation for 20x20 m quadrat, matching those used in main plot database
Quantifier if tree belongs to biannual survey. Enter "1" if part of biannual survey, "0" if not.
Quantifier if tree belongs to intraannual survey. Enter "1" if part of intraannual survey, "0" if not.
Quantifier if tree has been cored. Enter "1" if cored, "0" if not
Arbitrary numeric identifier for trees, identical to those used in the main plot database and useful for matching dendrometers to the plot data
Arbitrary numeric identifier for stems, identical to those used in the main plot database and useful for matching dendrometers to the plot data
First date of dendroband measurements for a particular tree
Last date of dendroband measurements for a particular tree

Year that a particular tree was considered dead. If a tree's dendro.end.date was in fall of 2013, though the tree wasn't called dead until spring 2014, the mortality.year = 2014. NB: some trees have had dendrobands removed but were not dead. This is clarified in tree.notes
Notes on overall band condition in the context of major changes (e.g. regarding start and end dates)
X-coordinate within each quadrat
Y-coordinate within each quadrat
X-coordinate within the entire plot
Y-coordinate within the entire plot
X-coordinate of stem in context of UTM Zone 17N
Y-coordinate of stem in context of UTM Zone 17N
latitude of stem in decimal degrees
longitude of stem in decimal degrees
